website_summaries.verdict: This oversized bag has room for almost anything. Unfortunately, though, it's larger than size restrictions at NFL games and some other venues allow.
pros: Made of sturdy PVC with 600D trim
Clear front pocket for easy access
cons: May not meet gallon-size restrictions NFL stadiums and some other venues have established

website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this bag very sturdy, but it also comes at a bargain price, especially considering its large size.
pros: Possesses handy outside pocket that zips shut to provide easy access to key items as well as a zipper across the top
19 inches wide by 14 inches long by 6 inches deep
Can be easily cleaned with a damp cloth between uses
Has sturdy, canvas bottom to support even a heavy load
cons: May be larger than some purchasers need

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as photo or measurements say.
customer_reviews.text: Measurements more like14” height x16 (flattened out)x 6 inches (true) Photo looks like large tote but is the size of a very roomy purse. Or 1/3 the size of a large tote.
customer_reviews.author: S & J  Bid

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I work in a prison where you must have clear bags to carry in so they are easily inspected. Very heavy plastic that is holding out where previous ones cracked in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clear stadium bag for sport events!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect clear stadium bag for attending sport events with strict requirements. The zippered top keeps everything in and protected, particularly in wet weather. This bag feels more secure than the open bags where people can just reach over and grab your stuff if you're not careful. The open top bags are also a bit scratchy at the seams and this one won't snag your clothing. The seams are reinforced which is a quality touch.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this bag. Just used it at a NCSU football game with no problems. It holds A LOT, to the point where can be rather heavy without you realizing it. It fit nicely under my seat and was out of the way during the game. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: This bag was good for football season
customer_reviews.text: This bag was good for football season. It's big enough to carry our shakers, water bottles, keys, sunscreen, etc., and the straps are long enough to easily wear it over my shoulder. I like that it zips since people tend to kick it or knock it over getting in and out of the stands. It doesn't show any wear from using it all season, so I think it'll hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clear tote bag at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clear tote bag and decided on this one, I'm very happy with it so far. It appears to be very durable and can hold a lot inside. It has a small pocket on the outside and zips closed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Practically Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for stadium venue!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this bag for all type of venue games. Its sturdy and holds up very well. We carried our wallets and 3 regular size water bottles and still had plenty of room. Not bulky and the best part is approved for all stadium venues. I would recommend this product over the actual NFL team logo ones, I also purchased one of those and it did not hold up compared to this one. If you want one with a team logo, I suggest your better off buying this one and putting your favorite team logo on yourself. It will save you money and will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Viazcan

customer_reviews.title: I like being able to see what's what just as much ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag because I work in a retail concern where employee theft prevention is a priority (as is everywhere). In that vein, I want to be transparent in my comings and goings at work. Well made bag, large, and very handy. Plus, I like being able to see what's what just as much as my store's security team. Bit of humor. Just to be clear, (pun intended), I don't use this for a purse; I use it to hold my Thermos, extra tools I need in my job, etc. I took it to work as soon as it arrived and now my co-workers want one. The zip top is a plus, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike'sSister

customer_reviews.title: Zipper sewn in upside down--thus unusable!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a number of good reviews, I purchased this bag to take to my reunion homecoming football game. It came and looked wonderful--until I tried to use it. The zipper had been sewn in iupside down! In other words, the zipper pulls are on the inside of the bag. Thus the zipper is unusable. I am returning it, of course. Duh.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl King

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great. I originally bought it to visit the stadium
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. I originally bought it to visit the stadium, but I've been using it as a toiletries bag when I travel. It's very well made and is thick and waterproof. Its comfortable to carry and holds A LOT! I'm sure I will find other uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleOne

customer_reviews.title: nice and strong bag but still is very flexible and ...
customer_reviews.text: Its clear, nice and strong bag but still is very flexible and soft to pack stuff in it and to put it in suitcase. It could fit in everything from our cosmetics, small shampoos, hair brush, curling iron, hair straightener, toothpaste, toothbrushes etc and some other items like medicines etc. Its very usefull and you can see everything clearly in it and finding stuff is easy. I will share some photos soon. Great for long vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Amit V.

customer_reviews.title: Lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bag for work, this is great size for my lunch box, jacket and other items. Height 13 in 15 width and is depth 8.5 roughly. Great item for the price. Packaged very well and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lin T.

customer_reviews.title: They let me in.
customer_reviews.text: The NFL stadium let me in with it, so I'm going to say it's legit. It seems sturdy enough (I packed a lot of stuff in there and it held). The straps are long enough to hang over my shoulder, the zipper works well and the bag expands. The only thing that sucks is that it's pure plastic (smells kind of gross too). Not great for the environment. Hope they make one with recycled plastic or something soon.
customer_reviews.author: Moon StarsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fits the need
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize (should have checked the rules) that I wouldn't be able to carry a normal handbag into the Georgia Dome and had to check it in at a tent outside the dome. I bought this when I knew my daughter had an upcoming event at the same venue. At first, she thought it was too large, but was happy to have it when she accumulated extra items at the event she attended. No problems with the handle or the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Curls

customer_reviews.title: Easy to sanitize with the COVID-19 virus.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bad that I could place my purse necessities in, but that I could easily sanitize after being out and about during this concerning time with the COVID-19 virus. I use it like a purse. People stop me and say, “What a great idea!” Then they ask me where to buy them. I respond back, “Amazon!” Don’t ruin your leather bags trying to keep them sanitized...just place your purse inside this bag if that is what you prefer. I just place my things in a few pretty cosmetic bags and place them directly in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: SAWB65

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I work at an airport. We are required to have clear bags. I carry lots of heavy files, IPad Pro, bottles of water & lots of additional paraphernalia. This is my 3rd bag over several years & they have all been very sturdy & held up well. I will definitely continue purchasing this bag & have no problem recommending to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kilika

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price, roomy, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a dozen of these bags to stuff with art supplies and distribute to young girls in crisis during the pandemic/protests. I'm fussy about the quality of things and for the price, these bags exceeded my expectations. They do smell a bit toxic at first but after four days of airing out, especially in the sun, most of the odor was gone. This is what I put in the bag: 60 art papers, journal, coloring book, markers, big box crayons, gel pens, clipboard, eraser, pencils, scissors, watercolors, sharpener. And there's room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Margery Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for what I needed. A couple days before we were to attend a rodeo, I received a message that no purses, solid totes, etc. would be allowed into the arena. The only thing I could take was a clear see-thru tote 12"x6"x12". I went into panic mode because where was I going to find a bag that matches those requirements. I went on Amazon and lo and behold, there it was. It met the requirements exactly. Because the seller shipped it immediately, I received it the day before the rodeo so had time to pack what I needed in it and went to the rodeo a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: LuvOahu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a clear, plastic beach bag with a zipper to keep my stuff dry. I sit near the water and sometimes a rogue wave drenches me and my beach stuff. The bag is sturdy, large, and zips. Fits beach towel, iphone, snacks, etc. with a lot of room to spare. However, it has a canvas border which gets damp. Since I like the size and the long handles in order to carry on my shoulder, I just insert a large, clear storage bag inside. I also clip the handles to the back of my beach chair to keep it off the wet sand.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. SG

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for my job. Sadly these are the times we live in. Makes life easier getting in and out of places when you have to get your bag checked. It's well made, love the zipper nothing falls out and comfy shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Reilly

customer_reviews.title: I could stack bricks inside and it would thank me for appreciating its strength and versatility.
customer_reviews.text: Aaa..mazing! I’ve already bought two and I’m trying to find a reason to buy another one. I’ll think of something! Literally everything about this bag is amazing. It’s the perfect shape and size, super thick and durable, and has strong straps. I use one of them for all my heavy tools, like a drill, hammer, wrenches, etc. I’m serious, I feel like I could stack bricks in it and it would thank me for appreciating its strength and versatility. I love the price and that it’s crystal clear, and I know where everything is before I reach inside.
customer_reviews.author: blissful gurl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Clear Carry Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these to take to the Derby (there were quite a few of us going). This is a nice large bag that held plenty of water bottles, snacks, sunscreen, and gave us plenty of additional space to stash the programs and drinking glasses we purchased. The reason that I went with this particular bag is because it has a zipper which seems to be somewhat difficult to find. That zipper makes all the difference. Even though you can see everything inside, I don't like having an open top bag when you're in such a public place. If you need a clear bag to take to an event, this is the perfect one.
customer_reviews.author: P. AJustice

customer_reviews.title: I'm sewing a stronger bottom stitch...
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and its ok. Good size for my lunch, water bottle, purse, and work things. BUT when I opened it to try my lunch box I noticed I could see light at the bottom side. Those straight stitches are loose and wide. Almost 1/4 inch each. (Most things are 3 stitches to this bag's 1) So I turned it inside out and will sew a stronger stitch. Thats easier than sending it back and buying something better and more than $8.20 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for taking to work
customer_reviews.text: I work in a warehouse where you have to use clear bags, and I bought this one because the fabric bottom seems sturdier than vinyl ones. I take a 32 ounce bottle of Gatorade, an empty sports bottle that I fill at work, gloves, keys, snacks and assorted other stuff I need. It all fits and doesn’t seem to be stressing the bag. Been using it for a couple weeks now, and it streamlines my routine because I keep all the work stuff there. I hang it up by the handles at home until I need it again.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than others but surely fine.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because it is as described. With you so I hope to turn it into five stars! I have ordered the PVC bag with polyester straps from two other sellers in a larger size. Extremely pleased with them! I noticed immediately however, that the thickness of the material seems thinner on this particular product possibly more flimsy. I am sure that it will suit my needs 4 grabbing the essentials on the go. Will update if this changes for better or worse
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: This bag was purchased for my upcoming trip. I wanted something easy to carry, able to hold a variety of items and very clear, so that I could find what I want easily. This fit the bill and I am very glad that I picked this bag.... perfect size, fashionable and sturdy..... Great buy and a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stella F. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pearl Harbor. Large size and good zipper
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, Zipper, and clear bag. Bought specifically for Pearl Harbor. Clear bags are the only bags allowed there. Got a thumbs up from the security guard! Also, used it at the beach. The zipper did a great job keeping out the sand. Really portable for traveling as the bag arrives flat. Only used it a week, but it held up nicely and I will use it on my next trip or for stadium purposes. Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Murphy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The main problem I was having with my clear plastic bags was them ripping at the top when overloaded. This bag doesn't appear to be having problems with all the stuff I put in it for work. I don't see any stress fractures forming at the top at all. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Mealika Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag, and has so far lasted longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag, and has so far lasted longer than any of the others I have purchased before it. I have to use it daily for work since I work in a prison. I frequently load it down with heavy objects (multiple bottles of water, lunch, breakfast, folders, notebooks.......) and the bottom remains in tact, the plastic sides have a few small cracks (after months of use) but in all it is holding together nicely. I will in the future (when it finally gives out) order another of these to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I was thinking.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very large bag, and it's only one pocket. It's fine for what I'm using it for, but it might not work for certain events. I like that the bottom is all canvas material instead of plastic. My last bag was all plastic and formed huge holes within a year, I'm hoping this one holds up better. Update: The bottom did hold up better but the rest of the bag still gave out with one year of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Iamthecatalyst

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I own a home care company and bought these this year as a gift for my caregivers. Great price, great item. Large enough to carry their supplies, paperwork, and personal items, and clients can see that there is nothing else in the bag. Very sturdy. Everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh S. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good Multitasker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a stand-in for my usual teacher bag that I carry back and forth to school all year. I wanted something that closes at the top and could be wiped down (as opposed to needing to be laundered or sprayed with Lysol). This bag holds quite a bit at once, and was sturdy and spacious enough to hold my laptop and a couple of books, my planner, pencil bag, and snacks. The vinyl seems a little thicker than expected, which is good, and the straps are long enough to go over my shoulder instead of needing to be carried in-hand. This meets my teacher bag needs and seems to be a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and clear
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the bags primarily for compartmentalizing projects and parts that ended up in the garage and hobby room. Using as an upgrade to large ziplocks which seem to get cloudy after use. As for travel, it has been convenient to be able to see what's in a given bag easily and to locate a specific item within the bag--allows for partial unpacking, that is, it's enough to pull out the transparent bag and everything is essentially unpacked. Zips.
customer_reviews.author: InABoxWithAFox

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 9th grade granddaughter since her school now requires students to carry clear backpacks. She loves the red webbing. The bag is roomy as long as the student doean't have several large books to carry at one time. After about 3 months, a 1-2 inch tear appeared. I didn't mind ordering a replacement since the price is so good. The bag would probably be great for lighter weight items.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Self-destructs - poor performance
customer_reviews.text: This bag was supposed to be the answer to a problem, but has become a source of frustration and disappointment. I have had a similar bag for 3 years with no issue, carrying books, papers with some heft. When I ordered these bags, I fully expected the same level of usefulness and durability. However, after a month of use, my students began having to repair the seams and trying to keep the bag from falling apart. The fabric at the base of the bag seems to be of inferior quality and pulls apart anywhere there's a seam.
customer_reviews.author: BEST

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this product. It is better than I expected. There is nothing I dislike about it. I will order from this seller again. I needed this bag because I work in the healthcare field and my job requires that I go to my clients homes. I don't want any of my clients to feel that I'm taking anything from them so by me carrying a bag that is transparent they can see what I have in my bag. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Latham

customer_reviews.title: I brought a few others....
customer_reviews.text: I use these types of bags for work. I brought others on amazon that didnt have the black bottom on it and they sucked and the plastic would break or have holes. So I looked for one that wasnt a plastic bottom, and found this one...AND ITS THE BEST ONE IVE BROUGHT EVER. IT NEVER BROKE AND IM STILL USING IT NOW FOR 4 MONTHS NOW. I WILL KEEP BUYING THIS PURSE WHENEVER THE ONE I HAVE NOW GIVES UP ON ME. Lol. Worth the price, sturdy and freaking cuteeee
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size! I work somewhere that all employees with bags must carry clear bags. The handles are the perfect length for me to sling over my shoulder. It zips which is perfect for rainy weather. It keeps its shape better than previous bags I've used by other companies. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie K. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers
customer_reviews.text: I do my preschool lessons at home so I bought 5 . I made labels for the days of the week and I put all my books and lesson plans, craft material ect. in for each day of the week. I can easily carry to work and everything is stored neatly and together. If I am absent one day and someone has to fill in, everything is ready for them. They are very sturdy, I pack quite a bit in there. The handles are made well and have not torn.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Bayt

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a knitting bag so I can see what I've got in there. It's small enough that I can take it with me everywhere! I just toss my little purse in when I'm heading out the door so that my knitting is with me wherever I go. I would recommend this as a knitting bag for anyone frustrated with the same old same old that's available out there for us crafters.
customer_reviews.author: ktMcD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for concerts!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to use when we go to concerts. There are restrictions on bag sizes unless it is clear/see through. This is just the right size to put a couple water bottles and snacks. You could fit a big bag of chips along with other needs. The stitching on the bag appears good and the bag overall appears sturdy. I have not had an opportunity to use the bag yet but am looking forward to trying it out!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased to use as my swimming gym bag. I had one similar that fell apart after years of usage. I looked local for this same bag and could not find one. It is a nice size that holds my Towel, Shower needs, wet swim suite, and more. I love to swim and this bag just makes it easier . Also great for Travel .... Fast shipping !
customer_reviews.author: Junebug608

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge and holds everything. Mine has just started to show signs of wear. For the price and how much it gets used..I can’t complain. The straps are starting to come off. I keep it loaded for everything I need for a day. (I work in an airport so we have to carry clear bags) I bought mine in August and am just now needing to replace it. Of course I wish it lasted longer, but I guess I got my monies worth.
customer_reviews.author: Emelia Duren

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for arena security...
customer_reviews.text: We used these at a convention in Tacoma, WA. They are sturdy enough to hang from wheelchair handles. and satisfied inspectors. It was much faster to clear security with the bags than our usual lunch boxes would have been. The bags fit perfectly under the seat. The zip closure is solid, but only the zipped slit opens for access- inconvenient at times.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: 😞😒😔
customer_reviews.text: I buy this bag for my cleaning business I was very disappointed when I receive this bag is very small I thought it was going to be a big bag. So I can put my extra cleaning supplies while I go clean out my customer home as you can see is the same size of the napkin
customer_reviews.author: May Fils

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying your knitting project
customer_reviews.text: With the clear heavy duty plastic I love carrying my current knitting project and a smaller project in case I get bored with the larger project You can see clearly where what ever you need is there. Thinking of ordering more. Would recommend to anyone and a great gift idea
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Allen

customer_reviews.title: Work Bag easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Work in a hospital wanted bag that would easily wipe clean and easily disinfected. Top zipper is great load it up zip, use clean hands to rummage through and clean at the end of the day. The quality surprised me for the price point. I have been cleaning for months now and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Daw

customer_reviews.title: Not For Long Term Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag on Jan 5, 2020 for a work security check bag and today 3/20/20 the seams are busting loose. Don't waste your money if you are looking for something to last longer than 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Cla

customer_reviews.title: Good size to be very useful
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't look to be too sturdy or durable for putting anything of much weight. However I'm not really sure how true that idea is. I bought it to use as the first aid bag in my car. I live in California where evacuating for wildfires is a very real threat and wanted a larger then usual first aid bag for my car's go bag because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie K.

customer_reviews.title: A very durable bag for work!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable bag and very roomy, I love this a lot and I use it everyday for work. And the material of this bag is thick plus it is zippered. I am very happy I purchased this bag and will for sure again buy this from the same seller. I highly recommend this bag. This is an honest review from me, thanks for reading😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Larger than the 12", stadium size. What puts this style way ahead, is the strap style reinforcement. Not just around the top as in the 12" stadium size, but all the way down. I was amazed at the weight and quality for $. These are sturdy! Zipper worked smoothly, even loaded. Ordered different colors for each individual, all were same great quality. Love the ability to view items without digging. 2 of us use for craft supplies. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pixter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a clear bag to use while attending a local comic convention. This worked perfectly, enabling me to use the no bag/clear bag line which was significantly shorter. The selling point for me was the water bottle holder on the outside and the small front pocket which was perfect for a cell phone. The price was exceptional especially considering I received it the day after I placed the order. I recommend this bag without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clear storage
customer_reviews.text: I really like these clear bags for toy storage. We have one for Legos, one for Barbies, and one for all the magna blocks we have. They are easy to tote around, you can easily see what is in them and they also have an outside pocket for storing directions in them. We really like the pocket feature for Legos. The handles are nice and sturdy and great for toting to daycare or a friend's house. Love clear and portable storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I work in a State correctional facility and we can only have clear bags. I like the piping around the edge and the pocket where I keep pens, etc. The zipper was another reason I purchased this as my paperwork stays dry walking from one building to another in the snow or rain. Super pleased to get two bags for the price too!
customer_reviews.author: MamaCass

customer_reviews.title: well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have to have see-through purses at my workplace, so I bought this to use for work. I used to use the large vinyl makeup bags, but those aren't sturdy enough to last very long with daily use. This bag is well made and sturdy, with strong straps for the handles. It will hold a lot of stuff. I also like that it has a zipper, so that when it rains, the contents of my purse don't get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bags are good. One of the zippers broke and I wanted a replacement but they didn't work with me. The bags had gone up in price and I didn't want to buy another one I wanted a replacement because I only had used it for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bag for Disney! It's sturdy and holds a ton- I've used it on multiple trips to the parks and it holds everything 3 kids would need (and makes it easy for security to check the bag quicker- I get thanked every time!). Has been left in the basket of the stroller for many rainstorms and kept the contents dry. Highly recommend- I bought a second one and gave to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: The product is too small and I would only get $1.27 back if I return it. We planned to use it as a ball bag for our 2.5 year old to take out to parks but it wouldn't even fit a toddler soccer ball with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Chenelle86

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tote bag. I purchased 2 thus far. One tote I used for my hair products. For example, hair brushes, hair clips, rubber bands and hair scarfs etc. Less clutter! Second tote I used to hold all my makeup, which was pefect because it is bigger than my actual makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have to bring a clear bag into work ( I work for The DOC. This bag is the perfect size and it really is sturdy, the clear bag is super durable and I can pack all my things in there I need for a 16hr shift and it’s awesome. I’ve had bags three times more expensive that only lasted a month or two. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for raining days, put non confidential things in it and it stylish.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag just for my likely. It's big and I can put lots of things in it; the price is unbelievable. Lately it have been raining! I live in the District of Columbia by ththe White House. Its come handy with the constant rain. I got so much compliments on this handbag. People are asking me where I got it from?? I told them Amazon and the price. The reason I gave it a 4 is small part of the stitches is coming apart. My grandma will take care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kass Kass

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to got o the Women's March in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to got o the Women's March in Washington in January, because I had heard that you could only take in a clear bag. I used this bag and it worked well. However, that is the only time I have needed it so far,so I don't know how well it holds up with repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Large, fits over my shoulder perfect, holder for my cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bag we take to the Hockey arena because they have a clear bag policy. It has a side pocket that's the perfect size for my cell phone and fits extras I purchase at the game store or gloves, etc that I take with me. Very happy with my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are incorrect/plastic stiff
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived folded, and felt stiff and ridgid. Opening the package up, the plastic felt like it might crack due to the plastic not being pliable. The measurements are not correct...the product insert states its a 19x14x6... product measured 17x13x6. We purchased this bag to put a car blanket in to keep it clean...not sure how long it will last, the plastic feels as if its going to crack and rip. I would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Karpauskas

customer_reviews.title: Fooled me ! NOT 6 “ wide !
customer_reviews.text: This is a bag formed from just two sheets of vinyl sealed together at the edges - there is NO SIX INCH PLEAT TO ACOMODATE 3 dimensional bulky items as I was led to believe. A 6” wide piece of material is attached on the bottom - but the rest of it zips shut FLAT . Fooled again !
customer_reviews.author: Donkey Howdy

customer_reviews.title: Well made, strong zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake, I wanted a waterproof bag and this bag has a porous bottom, but it I love it and I'm keeping it. Well made, strong zipper.
customer_reviews.author: addie

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for events
customer_reviews.text: This bag is well constructed and holds quite a bit of stuff. I especially like the reinforced bottom and zipper top. I wouldn't call it waterproof, but it is definitely water resistant. It is a little larger than an official NFL approved bag, but it served my needs excellently. I used it to bring a sun hat, seat cushion, binoculars, snacks, water bottles, sunscreen, collapsable umbrella, and rain jacket (we had all kinds of weather, lol!) to the Sail Boston 2017 event, and the security checkpoint staff appreciated that it was see-through.
customer_reviews.author: shunpiker

customer_reviews.title: Great for work or places that require a clear bag for security
customer_reviews.text: I bring this bag to work and it fits my makeup bag, wallet, and lunch with some room to spare. It zips up so you don't have to worry about anything falling out. The plastic is thin, so I'm not sure how durable it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Clear Tote
customer_reviews.text: This bags are perfect for the price if you work at a stadium. They last about a whole season and a half, with the mindset that you never know where you will be putting your bag. They are great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: niicollemariiee

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I work in a correctional facility and this bag still looks like new after two months of use. It won’t last forever, but it is a good value for the price already. FYI, it is very large, like a tote, so you can fit a lot in it, but only has the one pocket so I use small make-up bags to organize items inside.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for a Ballgame
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag. Nice quality and it is very large for the size.This bag great for sporting events and other outside events. It is clear so don’t have to pull everything out to find something. It has a side pocket and clear removal pouch with zipper. Can be easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for crochet projects.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags.I have 15 of them. I crochet and use them to keep everything for a project together. Because they are clear plastic yiu can see at a glance whats in the bag. They are sturdy plastic that isnt cracking and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bujak

customer_reviews.title: Good Size - But can't carry a lot of weight
customer_reviews.text: This bag was the perfect size to carry paperwork back and forth to work everyday for a job that requires I have a clear bag. Unfortunately, it did not last much more than two weeks. I needed a sturdier bag.
customer_reviews.author: faj588

customer_reviews.title: Great for sport events
customer_reviews.text: My family went to a NASCAR race in Loudon, NH. Anything we brought to the race needed to be in clear plastic. These bags were perfect for the situation. They hold a lot and are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for many uses
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for the beach,football game, snack travel bag ect.... I use it for my two little girls hair bag that we must take everywhere we go. It's made well, great product. So happy I found it.
customer_reviews.author: TS.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag to use for work. This bag is large enough to carry everything you need in it. Update: I recently purchased another bag. I’m using this one to hold all my car cleaning supplies in. This bag came in handy to keep all my car cleaning supplies in. A great space saver for the trunk
customer_reviews.author: rachel h

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as I needed it to. I went to a music conference and purses are no longer allowed. I had a pair of gloves, a light weight jacket and also a light weight blanket in it along with my wallet and sunglasses. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty/used; not super durable
customer_reviews.text: The first bag I received arrived dirty with wads of hair inside; it clearly had been used. The seller sent a replacement right away, though. The bag has loose threads and won’t last long, I fear, even when only used occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Beekimus

customer_reviews.title: This bag is made very classy and is going to be enjoyed for many
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! This bag made me a hit with my peers. This bag is made very classy and is going to be enjoyed for many, many outings for games, going to the beach and cruising. I like the smaller pocket that I did not see in the picture online. This made it easier for me to put our mascot image in it and I can easily change it out. This is a fantastic buy and I am glad I stumbled up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to carry my sample products in that looked professional (not in a big plastic ziploc bag) yet protected my other things from any spillage. The handles make it easy to retrieve from the larger bag that I carry it in. It is easy to wipe clean if there is a spillage. This bag is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Krisleen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great clear tote
customer_reviews.text: Needed this tote for high school student carrying books etc. unfortunately this world requires teens to use clear bags to carry their things to school. My daughter really likes this tote. So much better than a clear backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient bag
customer_reviews.text: Where I work, we can get searched coming in or leaving and I got tired of the security personnel going through my big, old leather bag so I bought this. I think I’ve been stopped three times since I got it and pretty much all I do is hold it up and turn it around and it’s all good. It holds quite a good bit and just wipes clean.
customer_reviews.author: fillyok

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag because in my line of work if I want to bring a bag into the pharmacy it has to be clear. I can fit my laptop in this bag which is 15.6 inches. I have at least 4 books and my laptop with a pouch for my pens, wireless mouse, and a 3 ringed binder.....thats alot of space
customer_reviews.author: nelle7287

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use at NRG stadium in Houston but found out the rodeo doesn’t have a clear bag policy. It’s a good bag for that kind of thing. It felt a bit cheap in the fastenings and the stitching was a bit wonky but for the price you can’t beat it. These kind of bags crack over time regardless of use or disuse. I wasn’t willing to spend too much $ on a purse that I will only use for concerts.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is a non-starter
customer_reviews.text: If your idea of having fun at the big game is wrestling with a zipper, this bag is for you, If not look elsewhere. Really a shame since otherwise it’s big, sturdy and looks as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: CC from Kirkland (Seattle's Riviera)

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I purchased this bag mainly because the one I've been using had no trimming and the sharp corner would scrap me from time to time. No worries with this bag. And it has plenty of space and seems very durable! And I like the fact that it has a large bonus pocket on the side. Honestly I ordered the bag not even knowing it had that. So it was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fits everything I need and then some
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag to tote my lunch, waterbottle, paperwork and magazines. I use BlueQ cases (jumbo, medium and pencil) to organize my stuff, the clear tote bag is a nice showcase for the colorful, cheeky BlueQ pouches
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice big bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love my big bag! They are great I actually use these on a daily basis I throw everything in it I actually like it more than my regular bag it’s nice to use them when it rains or when it snows so things won’t get wet I had a leather bag that got wet and it was extremely damage I had to throw it away and it was my best bag so now I use this bag in the rain or snow! But I love this bag
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good price.
customer_reviews.text: We have about 6 of these now. They are great for storing art stuff, crafts, knitting, etc. We are a "need to see whats in the bag" kinda family, so these are really helpful. They don't seem like they would be really sturdy, but none have ripped or fallen apart over the past several years.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Good value and size for the price l, very durable too
customer_reviews.text: Liked the size and color as well, it had been used for multiple things since I received it, next is cross stitch fabric to back stitch, 3 semi big ones to set up,and with tbis bag it makes duper easy to travel with my sewing projects! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: With the changes in the rules at ball games, was so glad to find what fits the bill. Like having a separate compartment so little things are easier to find. The plastic is good enough quality to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: jennie r.

customer_reviews.title: Good clear zippered bag
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy feel, not thin plastic, long double handles to carry over shoulder or long adjustable strap for cross body style. It also has a slip pocket on one of the sides, along with zippered inner small pocket. Very nice overall—just wish it had double zippers but at least the zippers all work smoothly:-)
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my farrier tools. It works fine. It's a thick plastic bag, so not flimsy at all. It's long enough to fit my rasps in it, so when I rummage in there, I can see what I'm grabbing. It doesn't take up much space in my trunk either. Good bag. Good Buy. If you need a clear bag, this one is good. Recommended? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Cloth on bottom ripped very quickly
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of this bag is heavy cloth. Both sides of the bottom of the bag ripped very soon after using it. Never had one do this before - usually the seam in the plastic breaks after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Michel A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Meets Requirements of those who work in prisons or jails...
customer_reviews.text: This clear plastic bag meets the standard requirements for those who work inside a prison, and is also a great bag to bring along to sporting events. This is a very sturdy medium sized plastic bag. It is neither too large or too small. It's a perfect size to carry my items to work on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for security reasons
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for going to secure events where clear bags are required. There was adequate room to carry what we needed to attend the event. So far it it withstanding all abuse we have given it so the quality is very good. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It's lightweight and easy to carry around when I'm running around campus. The plastic is pretty and clear but still thick enough to be durable. A nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: A Great, Clear Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my needs. I worked for a security sensitive company and had to use a clear bag. This held everything I needed to bring. There was a little wear and tear over time, but I’m sure that was due to how often I used it (it took and beating). I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ann

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I use it at the gym and pool. I can see all of my items without having to empty it out to find what I want. The side pocket makes a great place to put keys or a phone. The fact that it's plastic is excellent since I usually have a wet suit to carry. It did not have that particular plastic smell either.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fehn

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to carry cat food and supplies to areas where I feed feral cats. It stays clean, is easy to wipe with a damp rag, and large enough to carry supplies comfortably. It would be great for grocery hauls and the like. I would purchase another one !
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

product_meta.title: Bags for Less Large Clear Vinyl Tote Bags Shoulder Handbag (Black)
feature_bullets: YOU BUY ONCE, YOU ENJOY FOR LIFE: The Bags For Less clear stadium bag with pocket is made of extremely sturdy, clear PVC w/600D trim. What is more, it has a 6’’ full zipper top gusset. In addition, the 19’’ wide and 14’’ height size gives you the opportunity to safely store anything you like in it!

COMFORTABLE, STRIKING, MODERN DESIGN: If you wish to catch everyone’s attention and stand out, this elegant and stylish clear PVC bag is a must have for you! Featuring a transparent body, a colored fabric bottom and long matching handles, it is incomparably trendy and striking.

ENJOY COUNTLESS POSSIBILITIES: This clear tote bag can be used for a wide variety of different purposes. It makes an ideal gym, toiletry, cosmetics, beach, grocery, travel, work and art supplies bag too! We bet that it will become your all-time favorite!

SAVE YOURSELF TIME AND TROUBLE: Forget about wasting your time trying to find your mobile phone or your keys. Pass security checks easily without facing any trouble! This must have clear zippered stadium bag with handles features a clear, transparent body and an additional clear, front pocket that allow you to neatly store all you need and grab them without searching for ages.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: Offering you the best products and serving all your needs has always been our top goal. This is why we offer you a full refund in case this clear stadium security bag does not meet all your demands.
